sort and reverse-sort per column

Determine whether text can be copied and pasted from text fields

Vrify that dragging an image onto the desktop saves the image

Verify that dragging onto a frame-set

Verify that browser contents can be dragged to

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on
      the form itself.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled,
      that you are given the pre-fill dialog and when you click cancel,
      the information is not filled into the form.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled
      and have several choices for fields that you are given the pre-fill
      dialog and can select from the appropriate values and the information
      is filled into the form.
Verify that the F1 key brings up the Help dialog

Verify that there are "Big tooltips" - Similar to popup help for

Verify that you have the ability to search by typing keyword

        but it is related to topic.

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of

        documents)

Verify that is it is possible to have favorite help topics -
        similar to IE help which has a special tab to add favorite help

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you

Verify that you can move around pages with the up and down arrow

Verify that you can't drag docs into the help window

Determine whether Creating web pages help content displays

Determine whether the Best Standards Support displays

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop

Determine that you can right click an image and send it via
